description: This file initializes a JSON knowledge base with vector search capabilities, sets up an agent, and runs an asynchronous query to interact with the knowledge base.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs responses.

classes.name: JSONKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Handles JSON-based knowledge storage and retrieval, with vector search support.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client used for storing and searching vector embeddings.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates a response from the agent based on a query.
